name: unBroken Dreams
description:
You are a doll abandoned by your owner. You are thrown in a perverted world of rejected toys and have to survive, fight, and scavenge the parts of your fallen rivals to repair yourself and unravel your wrath upon those who broke your body... but not your dreams.

PROGRAMMED BY

Diogo Castro

Diogo Tito Marques

Pedro Granja

Ricardo Sousa

 

GRAPHICS BY

Susana Gamito

 

MUSIC BY

Diogo Almeida
